description: Maintenance works proposed for the River Lea Crossing road bridge carrying the A13 road over the River Lea include the following: - Replacement of the spandrel posts and vertical bracing. - Local repairs to plates and rivets in the arch ribs and stringer beams. - Straightening of deformed arch rib flanges and stiffeners. - Replacement of plan bracing members. - Surface repairs to pin bearing pedestals. - Removal of the existing deck surfacing and granite setts, constructing a reinforced concrete slab to accept a spray-applied bridge deck waterproofing system over the entire deck prior to resurfacing. - Removal of concrete repairs on the abutment walls, and replacement with a durable alternative. - Replacement of the existing parapet. - Sand blasting of all steelwork, and painting with a high-build glass flake epoxy paint system with fluoropolymer topcoat to give a longer interval to major maintenance.
